    • Method Detail

      • metadataEquals

        public static boolean metadataEquals(DataCiteMetadata metadata1,
                                     DataCiteMetadata metadata2)
        Compare two DataCite metadata objects. Unlike DataCiteMetadata.equals(Object) the method is case-insensitive for DataCiteMetadata.Identifier#getValue(). This is needed because the DataCite keeps DOIs in uppercase, and GBIF does in lowercase.

      • metadataEquals

        public static boolean metadataEquals(String xmlMetadata1,
                                     String xmlMetadata2)
        Compare two metadata objects. First convert them to DataCiteMetadata and apply metadataEquals(DataCiteMetadata, DataCiteMetadata) afterwards.

      • isCompatibleMetadata

        public static boolean isCompatibleMetadata(String xmlMetadata)

      • isNotCompatibleMetadata

        public static boolean isNotCompatibleMetadata(String xmlMetadata)

      • metadataDifference

        public static Difference metadataDifference(String xmlMetadata1,
                                            String xmlMetadata2)
        Compare two metadata objects and get Difference between them.
